brief_title: Efficacy, Safety and Tolerability of Denosumab in the Treatment of Rheumatoid Arthritis
brief_summary: This study will determine the efficacy, safety, and tolerability of denosumab (AMG 162) in the treatment of Rheumatoid Arthritis (RA).
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - Diagnosis of RA. - All subjects will be required to have been taking a stable dose of methotrexate. - Active RA at screening defined as greater than or equal to 6 swollen joints. - The presence of erosive disease Exclusion Criteria: - Received any biologic agent (e.g., Enbrel®, Remicade®, Humira®, Kineret®) or Arava® within 8 weeks before randomization; past use of these agents is allowed. - Steroid use greater than 15 mg/day. - Scheduled for surgery or joint replacement in the hands, wrists or feet.
